text: AI purnn zatiche tharavta, kitleak tori badol zatolo. Mhoji cousin, Priya, TCS-ant kam korta ani tika kollon aasa ki te already coding assistance khatir AI vaparta, koxe autocompleting tasks. Mhaka mhozo bhai, Rakesh, sangta ki local dukana-i AI chatbots vaparta customer service-ak тАУ vichar kor, ek bot tuka chai ani samosas vikta! Punn hanv azun thode dukhdikant aassa, te vostavik jage vortolo kai? Ani hanven ek article polloilem je sangta ki AI-ak zaito data zai, koxe 1000s GB, bore bhaxen xinkpavak-ui.
